list.title: Primary alert
list.text: Welcome back! Go to your special offers page to see now.

list.title: Secondary alert
list.text: Holy guacamole! You should check in on some of those fields below.

list.title: Info alert
list.text: On no! Something really bad happened!

list.title: Danger alert
list.text: Heads up! This alert needs your attention, but it's not super important.

list.title: Light alert
list.text: Holy guacamole! Best check yo self, you're not looking too good.

list.title: Dark alert
list.text: Your server is working at optimum speed.
